title: WSB's Weekend Bite: Sticky Inflation and Nominal GDP Growth With Michael Cramer
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
This week we're joined by Michael Cramer, Founder of Mott Capital Management to dive into sticky inflation, nominal GDP growth, and an S&P target level he is watching for a bottom to form. Plus, Kim Khan gives the heads up on what to watch next week in Catalyst Watch.

Weekend Bite Twitter Poll - https://bit.ly/3UPtAJ3

Sign up for the Free Earnings Webinar on October 11th at 2 PM ET - https://bit.ly/3SuiibJ
